title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Tue Mar 6, 2018 | 8:05am   
Smoke billows from burning cars during a fire at a plot where police kept seized vehicles in Tegucigalpa, Honduras. REUTERS/Jorge Cabrera Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Smoke billows from burning cars during a fire at a plot where police kept seized vehicles in Tegucigalpa, Honduras. REUTERS/Jorge Cabrera Close 1 / 24 
A member of the Traditionalist Workers Party does a salute outside of a Richard Spencer speech on the campus of Michigan State University in East Lansing, Michigan. REUTERS/Stephanie Keith Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A member of the Traditionalist Workers Party does a salute outside of a Richard Spencer speech on the campus of Michigan State University in East Lansing, Michigan. REUTERS/Stephanie Keith Close 2 / 24 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un shakes hands with Chung Eui-yong who is leading a special delegation of South Korea's President. KCNA/via Reuters Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 North Korean leader Kim Jong Un shakes hands with Chung Eui-yong who is leading a special delegation of South Korea's President. KCNA/via Reuters Close 3 / 24 
A sailor drinks, as he guards among aircraft, aboard the U.S. Navy aircraft carrier, USS Carl Vinson, after it docked at a port in Danang, Vietnam. REUTERS/Kham Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A sailor drinks, as he guards among aircraft, aboard the U.S. Navy aircraft carrier, USS Carl Vinson, after it docked at a port in Danang, Vietnam. REUTERS/Kham Close 
LEGO House in Billund, Denmark. Scanpix Denmark/Mads Claus Rasmussen via REUTERS Reuters / Tuesday, March 06, 2018 LEGO House in Billund, Denmark. Scanpix Denmark/Mads Claus Rasmussen via REUTERS Close 5 / 24 
A woman walks past graffiti reading 'Strike. 24 hours' alongside a female gender symbol in Bilbao, Spain, in reference to a women only strike called for Thursday's International Women's Day. REUTERS/Vincent West Reuters / Tuesday, March 06, 2018 A woman walks past graffiti reading 'Strike. 24 hours' alongside a female gender symbol in Bilbao, Spain, in reference to a women only strike called for Thursday's International Women's Day. REUTERS/Vincent West Close 6 / 24 
Civil defence members sit amid the rubble as they watch an aid convoy of Syrian Arab Red Crescent driving through the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Civil defence members sit amid the rubble as they watch an aid convoy of Syrian Arab Red Crescent driving through the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Close 7 / 24 
President Trump meets with Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in the Oval Office of the White House. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 President Trump meets with Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in the Oval Office of the White House. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Close 8 / 24 
A worker cleans the site where the Trump name was removed from the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower in Panama City, Panama. REUTERS/Carlos Lemos Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A worker cleans the site where the Trump name was removed from the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower in Panama City, Panama. REUTERS/Carlos Lemos Close 9 / 24 
Terry Bryant, accused of stealing Frances McDormand's best actress Oscar at the lavish Governor's Ball party, is seen in this still image from Reuters video in Hollywood. REUTERS/Reuters TV Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Terry Bryant, accused of stealing Frances McDormand's best actress Oscar at the lavish Governor's Ball party, is seen in this still image from Reuters video in Hollywood. REUTERS/Reuters TV Close 10 / 24 
A   fighter rests at mount Bafliyun, in the Afrin region,   Monday, March 05, 2018 A   fighter rests at mount Bafliyun, in the Afrin region,   11 / 24 
Bill Cosby exits with his lawyer Tom Mesereau (L) following a pretrial hearing for his sexual assault trial at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Bill Cosby exits with his lawyer Tom Mesereau (L) following a pretrial hearing for his sexual assault trial at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Close 12 / 24 
A model presents a creation by German designer Karl Lagerfeld as part of his Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show for fashion house Chanel at the Grand Palais during Paris Fashion Week. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Reuters / Tuesday, March 06, 2018 A model presents a creation by German designer Karl Lagerfeld as part of his Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show for fashion house Chanel at the Grand Palais during Paris Fashion Week. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Close 13 / 24 
People drink wine during a gathering to mark the anniversary of Soviet leader Joseph Stalin's death in his hometown of Gori, Georgia. REUTERS/David Mdzinarishvili Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 People drink wine during a gathering to mark the anniversary of Soviet leader Joseph Stalin's death in his hometown of Gori, Georgia. REUTERS/David Mdzinarishvili Close 14 / 24 
A man walks on the rubble of damaged buildings at the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A man walks on the rubble of damaged buildings at the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, Damascus, Syria. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh Close 15 / 24 
Members of the alt-right including members of the Traditionalist Workers Party fight with protesters outside of a Richard Spencer speech on the campus of Michigan State University in East Lansing, Michigan. REUTERS/Stephanie Keith Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Members of the alt-right including members of the Traditionalist Workers Party fight with protesters outside of a Richard Spencer speech on the campus of Michigan State University in East Lansing, Michigan. REUTERS/Stephanie Keith Close 16 / 24 
Stoneman Douglas Band Director Alexander Kaminsky is seen during a band rehearsal in New York. REUTERS/Eduardo Munoz Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Stoneman Douglas Band Director Alexander Kaminsky is seen during a band rehearsal in New York. REUTERS/Eduardo Munoz Close 17 / 24 
Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives for the opening session of the National People's Congress (NPC) at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, China. REUTERS/Damir Sagolj Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives for the opening session of the National People's Congress (NPC) at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, China. REUTERS/Damir Sagolj Close 18 / 24 
A boy looks at a 3D installation at Dubai Canvas in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. REUTERS/Ahmed Jadallah Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A boy looks at a 3D installation at Dubai Canvas in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. REUTERS/Ahmed Jadallah Close 19 / 24 
Sheep eat grain left out by farmer Thomas Jones as his field behind is covered in heavy snow in Blessington, Ireland. REUTERS/Clodagh Kilcoyne Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Sheep eat grain left out by farmer Thomas Jones as his field behind is covered in heavy snow in Blessington, Ireland. REUTERS/Clodagh Kilcoyne Close 20 / 24 
A model presents a creation by British designer Stella McCartney, during her Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show, at Fashion Week in Paris. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A model presents a creation by British designer Stella McCartney, during her Autumn/Winter 2018-2019 women's ready-to-wear collection show, at Fashion Week in Paris. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Close 
Afghan men row a raft on a lake in Kabul, Afghanistan. REUTERS/Mohammad Ismail Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Afghan men row a raft on a lake in Kabul, Afghanistan. REUTERS/Mohammad Ismail Close 22 / 24 
A detail onboard of the U.S. Navy aircraft carrier, USS Carl Vinson, is seen after it docked at a port in Danang, Vietnam. REUTERS/Kham Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 A detail onboard of the U.S. Navy aircraft carrier, USS Carl Vinson, is seen after it docked at a port in Danang, Vietnam. REUTERS/Kham Close 23 / 24 
Local residents collect bottled water distributed by Thames Water after mains supplies to homes were cut off following bad weather, in Balham, south London. REUTERS/Toby Melville Reuters / Monday, March 05, 2018 Local residents collect bottled water distributed by Thames Water after mains supplies to homes were cut off following bad weather, in Balham, south London. REUTERS/Toby Melville Close
